verses.roman:
prathamāvasare jagannātha-daraśana
nṛtya-gīta kare daṇḍa-paraṇāma, stavana

synonyms: prathama-avasare—in the beginning; jagannātha-daraśana—seeing the Deity of Lord Jagannātha; nṛtya-gīta kare—performs chanting and dancing; daṇḍa-paraṇāma—offering obeisances; stavana—offering prayers.
translation: In the beginning, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu saw the Deity of Lord Jagannātha in the temple. He offered Him obeisances and prayers and danced and sang before Him.
